Tiger's Milk

Adele Davis' original recipe.

Ingredients

Amount Ingredient
1 cup Milk
1⁄4 cup Powdered Milk
1⁄3 ea Banana
1 tbsp Brewer's Yeast
2 tbsp Wheat Germ
